articles.description: After over a decade of marriage, Peter Marshall was diagnosed with Alzheimer's and forgot he was married. So he fell back in love with his wife, Lisa.
articles.content:
Jason van Genderen from Australia built his mom a virtual aquarium display. It was a place they used to go before she was diagnosed with Alzheimer's disease.
USA TODAY

articles.title: Lana Del Rey Shares New 'Blue Banisters' Cover, Previews Single - Stereogum
